_header: For and ne love morrow and eve
Subjects: love, divine and human; love, toward Jesus
_description: Description of divine love — four couplets in pairs separated by prose text

Bod649.First Lines:
ffor & ne loue morw and euefor loue is fresche and euer
                    neweIn wele and wo loue stondid fast for lyue for deth loue wil
                    last…
Bod649.Last Lines:
…in wele and woo he stondith fast for liue for deth his loue
                    wil lastloue him bothe morow and euehis loue is fresche and euer
                    newe
